result.arabic_text: فَمَن تَابَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ظُلۡمِهِۦ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ
result.translation: 39.Isi nafsi Garqo abaamat yudlumeh yan num, tohuk lakal Yallal gaceeh isi taama yessemeqqek, toysa diggah Yalli toobat kaak oggolah, diggah Yalli dambi Cabti-li xuwaw-li kinni.
